message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you.  While I cannot disclose the exact details of the product's worth, I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This represents a potential gain for you, as I know the product is worth no less than $800000 to me.  I understand you may have questions, and I'm happy to discuss further. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this opportunity.
